title: can't login in the new client
body:
Say's authenticating forever 
tried changing DNS / run as admin / ipconfig /renew/release/flushdns.
also at times tells me some couldn't connect to login que got to support/ contact us

replies.body:
Typically an authentication error is a sign that your network is having a hard time connecting to our servers so it can't verify your login information. It looks like you've done most of the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) already, so you may be having a very specific issue. 

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our tech guys will be able to go much more in depth for you there!
